Class GameObj

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObj

  • public class GameObj
extends java.lang.Object
    An object in the game with a position, a colour, and a direction of movement. It is super class of Brick and Ball
    See Also:
    Brick, Ball

      boolean hitBy(GameObj obj)
      Detect collision between this object and the argument object It's easiest to work out if they do NOT overlap, and then return the negative (with the ! at the beginning)
